name: plan_item_success
prompt: Create a Fire Wand that shoots fireballs when used. After creating it, give it to me. After spawning, you MUST call verify_and_save to check if it works correctly.

verify.code: () => { const inventory = window.__VOXEL_GAME__.player.inventory; const hasItem = inventory.items.some(i => i && i.name.toLowerCase().includes('firewand')) || inventory.hotbar.some(i => i && i.name.toLowerCase().includes('firewand')); return hasItem ? { success: true } : { success: false, message: 'Fire Wand not found in inventory' }; }

visual_expectations.description: A player holding a wand that shoots fire
